actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: A bill to amend section 502(b) of the Mutual Security Act of 1954 to reinstitute specific accounting requirements for foreign currency expenditures in connection with congressional travel outside the United States.

summary.text: Requires that information relating to foreign travel by Members of Congress be open to public inspection and published periodically in the Congressional Record. (Amends 22 U.S.C. 1754)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 502(b) of the Mutual Security Act of 1954 to reinstitute specific accounting requirements for foreign currency expenditures in connection with congressional travel outside the United States.
